title: Police give great-grandmother gift card instead of ticket
body: ORLANDO (SBG) — A great-grandmother was given a $25 Advanced Auto Parts gift card instead of a ticket after she was pulled over by an  for broken brake lights on her vehicle. In the video, the woman explains she was on her way to pick up one of her great-grandchildren from school while also driving with another one of her great-grandchildren in the backseat. She tells the officer she's a great-grandmother doing the best she can when the officer instructs her to try and find a car seat for the child buckled up in the backseat.
